DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the efficacy and safety of nebule procaterol with nebule salbutamol in the treatment of moderate acute asthma.
DOC.brief_title: Nebulized Procaterol Versus Nebule Salbutamol for the Treatment of Moderate Acute Asthma
DOC.criteria: 1. Patients with moderate acute asthma according to Global Initiative for Asthma (GINA) 1998 (Appendix 1).
